name: She Lives in the Forest
description:
A witch lives in exile from a nearby village. Every night the villagers come to her in secret asking for help. She can choose to help them or turn them away, but every choice she makes will have its consequences.

Features:

  • Multiple endings
  • Crafting
  • Interaction options

Controls

  • WASD to move
  • Space to jump
  • Shift or Ctrl to run
  • L mouse or "e" to interact
  • "j" for journal
  • "i" for inventory

Please be aware. This game does not contain graphic or violent imagery, but it does briefly mention heavy subject matter.
